title: Chelsea: Ask your pre-season questions
title_page: Chelsea: Ask your pre-season questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
Chelsea are returning home after an unbeaten excursion to the United States for their pre-season tour.
But what does their fine form mean for the upcoming campaign?
And how are the Blues shaping up in general before the opener against Liverpool on Sunday, 13 August?
Ask your burning questions on all things Blues and we will put a selection before our reporter for their insider take.
